{{disambig-two: }}'''Cemendur''' was the son of [[Axantur]] and a member of a minor branch of [[Númenóreans
the [[Númenóreans: Númenórean]] royalty. He had two children, a daughter [[Írildë]] and a son [[Hallatan]]. Hallatan would later become the father of [[Hallacar]], the husband of [[Tar-Ancalimë]], the first [[Ruling Queen of Númenor]].<ref>{{UT
